description: Configuration for calculating activation example similarity metrics

field_descriptions.prompt_ids_analyzed: List of prompt IDs selected for analysis
field_descriptions.num_total_activations: Total number of activation examples for this feature
field_descriptions.avg_pairwise_semantic_similarity: Average cosine similarity across all pairs of 32-token windows
field_descriptions.pos_entropy: Shannon entropy of POS tag distribution across max activated tokens
field_descriptions.top_pos_tags: Top 3 most frequent POS tags with counts and frequencies
field_descriptions.top_common_ngrams: Most frequent n-gram per size with per-prompt positions
field_descriptions.quantile_boundaries: Activation value thresholds for the 4 quantiles [q1, q2, q3]
